fixed_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 143.0%/150.2%/157.3% of Attack. 100.0%/105.0%/110.0% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Electric Dance

innate_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 57.0/59.8/62.7% of Attack. 31.7/33.3/34.9% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Mazionga

innate_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP by 35.6/37.4/39.2% of Attack + 1077/1333/1608.
innate_skill.name: Diarama

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 15%. When foes are Shocked, increase party's critical rate by 8.5% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Divine Exultation

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 15%. When foes are Shocked, increase party's critical rate by 10% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Divine Exultation I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
